code:
# @param {Integer[]} nums1
# @param {Integer[]} nums2
# @return {Integer}
def min_sum(nums1, nums2)
  zero_count1 = nums1.count(0)
  zero_count2 = nums2.count(0)
  sum1 = nums1.sum
  sum2 = nums2.sum
  
  return -1 if zero_count1 > 0 && zero_count2 > 0 && sum1 == sum2
  
  if sum1 > sum2
    return sum1 + zero_count2 if zero_count1 == 0
  elsif sum2 > sum1
    return sum2 + zero_count1 if zero_count2 == 0
  else
    return sum1 if zero_count1 == 0 && zero_count2 == 0
    return [sum1 + zero_count2, sum2 + zero_count1].max
  end
  
  diff = (sum1 - sum2).abs
  if zero_count1 > 0 && zero_count2 > 0
    equal_sum = [sum1 + zero_count2, sum2 + zero_count1].max
    return equal_sum if diff < equal_sum
  elsif zero_count1 > 0
    return sum2 + zero_count1 if diff < zero_count1
  elsif zero_count2 > 0
    return sum1 + zero_count2 if diff < zero_count2
  end
  
  -1
end
